entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Then increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
